participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to share stories and sing.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i am in the third grade. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and confident, enjoys discussing finance and business.
participant_2.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year.

content.text: Nice to see you! I like to sing songs from my spare time
